attacks.name: Time Call
attacks.text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon and put it on that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Time Wager
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack's base damage is 50 instead of 100.
